phrs.translation: 希奇, 的中文意思, 幻想

sentences.sentence: Sometimes, after she had stared at her until she was wrought up to the highest pitch of fancifulness , she would ask her questions and find herself ALMOST feeling as if she would presently answer.
sentences.translation: 很多次她一直盯着埃米莉很长时间，慢慢她觉得自己的幻想仿佛都变成事实了，这时，她就会向埃米莉提问，她觉得埃米莉准会给她满意的答复。
